item.title: @elonmusk: If you were to say that Black people are being eliminated off of the planet, Democrats would call it...
item.description: If you were to say that Black people are being eliminated off of the planet, Democrats would call it a genocide. But if you say White people are being ethnically cleansed, Democrats applaud it. Absolutely shameful.
